channel.title: PlayStation on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PlayStation on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sony’s new PS5 Power Saver mode sounds ideal for a PlayStation handheld
item.description: Sony is starting to test a new Power Saver mode for PS5 consoles that will allow games to “run with lower power consumption.” The Power Saver mode is being revealed as part of a new PS5 system update

item.title: Sony’s new PS5 Power Saver mode sounds ideal for a PlayStation handheld
item.description: Sony is starting to test a new Power Saver mode for PS5 consoles that will allow games to “run with lower power consumption.” The Power Saver mode is being revealed as part of a new PS5 system update

item.title: Sony’s 30th Anniversary DualSense Controller is back in stock online at 10AM ET
item.description: Sony will have a “limited restock” of its 30th Anniversary DualSense Wireless Controller on the PlayStation Direct storefront. The $79.99 gamepad is available for preorder starting July 21st at 10AM E

item.title: The best Prime Day deals on games, hardware, and accessories
item.description: The final day of Amazon’s Prime Day is the your last chance to score incredible deals on games to fill your backlog, as well as essential accessories like controllers, headsets, and storage expansion
